Comment: What a great place on a Sunday morning to come out and play some baseball. The nice sized park is perfect for baseball (not everyone plays softball) with a good home-run fence. The infield is made with red sand that fields well for infield ground balls if the sand is groomed well before the game. Please note: red sand means red marks when you slide on the bases so it dirty. Happy to play there again, even if I hit horribly last game! lol.
